programmes.show_description: With Honors. Day care worker Avis Banks and teacher Keyon Pittman quickly fell for each other. But a secret relationship would destroy their promising future together. S7, Ep3
Unlucky In Love. After two failed marriages, Tabatha Spake can't take much more heartbreak. Just when she finally finds happiness, a monster turns her dreams into a nightmare. S7, Ep4
In His Father's Footsteps. In Long Island, a promising college student is shot dead in a botched robbery. Detectives study surveillance footage to track down two suspects. S7, Ep3
Headlights And Fire. When an unidentified body is discovered in Pierce County, detectives use surveillance footage to track down the perpetrator of this gruesome crime. S7, Ep4

Left in the Cold. Senior Investigator Debby MacDonald and her partner Mark Ramos are at an address that has been the subject of cruelty complaints several times before. S4, Ep5
Grave Discoveries. Forensic scientists re-evaluate unsolved crimes and apply new methods to solving them. S3, Ep10
Texas Rangers. Examines the history and modern evolution of the Texas Rangers, who were formed in the 1830s to protect settlers against attacks from natives. S3, Ep11
Radical Agenda. New Jersey state trooper Phillip Lamanco is shot dead on duty. Detectives try to find his killers. Is there a link to a terrorist future plot? S6, Ep4
The Killing Zone. The violent activities of gang members from the 'K Street Crew' are investigated by the Safe Streets Task Force. S6, Ep5
Claudia Lawrence/Len Saunders. Robert Rinder examines the case of 35-year-old Claudia Lawrence's disappearance. Plus, an unprovoked attack leaves a man fighting for his life. S5, Ep8
One Way Ticket Out. When a lifelong Long Islander, Donna Bocklet, announces she's moving to Florida, it sends a shock wave through her friends and family that ends in her murder. S4, Ep9
Michele Whitaker: The Last Truck Stop. Michele hitches from a truck stop and vanishes. But her family never give up hope, and incredibly the case ends, years later, with a miracle. S1, Ep3
The Painted Truck. Detectives turn to CCTV footage after the shooting of an elderly man in Texas. An old pickup truck could hold the key to identifying the man's killer. S10, Ep6
Chacey Poynter. When firefighter Bob Poynter is killed, no-one appears more devastated than his young wife, Chacey. But soon detectives discover a web of lies. S3, Ep5
Drip, Drip! Nurse and private investigator Nikki and Jimmy Cappello are a dynamic duo - until Jimmy suddenly goes missing. S11, Ep3
Double Take. Living in his CEO wife's shadow proves too much for failed football player Roy Harvison, and the price will be more than one life. S11, Ep4

programmes.show_name: American Detective With Lt Joe Kenda
programmes.show_description: The Creek. A home health care aide's body floats in a rural Connecticut creek. Detective Garritt Kelly joins the investigation to bring justice to a community gripped by fear. S2, Ep6
Michelle Stewart/David Irwin. A young woman's ex-boyfriend refuses to take no for an answer. Plus, a young father is left fighting for his life after a brutal assault. S5, Ep10
Fallen Star. In 2021, KJ Taylor was killed during a drive-by shooting. On a trail of CCTV, the truck is spotted stalking KJ in the hour before the shooting. S9, Ep11
Edward Beaudion. Detective Jason Moran reopens the case of serial killer John Wayne Gacy. The grieving family of Edward Beaudion, missing for 40 years, wonder if he was a victim. S1, Ep2
Death In Hell's Kitchen. As Pride Month kicks off in 2022, the deaths of two gay men in New York City shatter their families and the gay community. S9, Ep9
Claudia Lawrence/Len Saunders. Robert Rinder examines the case of 35-year-old Claudia Lawrence's disappearance. Plus, an unprovoked attack leaves a man fighting for his life. S5, Ep8
By Design. Talented artist Kira and marketing manager Matthew appear to be happily married. Until one day, a maintenance worker makes a grisly discovery. S7, Ep5
What The Heart Wants. Seven years into their marriage, something changes between a husband and wife - and a dirty secret at work will lead to a deadly confrontation. S7, Ep6
Come Quickly, I'm Afraid. In Kentucky, a pawn store robbery leaves three people dead. Detectives use a trail of video to pursue a silver van in the hope of catching a killer. S7, Ep5
Meet Me At Midnight. 24-year-old Ryan Lane goes missing after receiving a mysterious call. Can CCTV footage help detectives find out what happened to this loving father? S7, Ep6

Cat Catching. Investigator Shaun Hairston leads a team to a cat-hoarder's house. She's amassed 100 cats, and they find some in the oven and in the pipes. Can they remove them all? S4, Ep6
Bad Medicine. A thought-provoking look at how drug trafficking has spawned a violent and deadly criminal underground. S3, Ep12
Unlikely Sources. How baffling crimes have been solved through evidence provided by insects, beer bottles and other seemingly meaningless objects. S3, Ep13
Deadly Takeover. Two gunmen rob a Seattle bank. One of the gunmen is killed in a firefight with police, while the other escapes after assaulting a family. Can he be caught? S6, Ep6
The Perfect Heist. The FBI is called after a vault door refuses to open as it has been blasted into from the ceiling and over $2 million in valuables is gone. S6, Ep7
Nicola Hughes And Fiona Bone. In September 2012, Dale Cregan murdered PC Nicola Hughes and PC Fiona Bone, after luring them to a callout by making a false 999 call. S5, Ep9
Strangled By Love. Vivacious single-mom Dana is busy juggling a boyfriend, a jealous ex-husband, and a secret lover. But then, her life is cut short by someone close. S1, Ep1
Royal Daniel: Royal Secrets. The disappearance of a local lawyer paralyses a mountain town in Colorado. Soon clues emerge that the community's idyllic veneer is not all it seems. S1, Ep4
The Dog Knows. When 37-year-old Merrilee Cox-Lafferty disappears in Utah, police turn to CCTV to track her down. Then her car turns up 300 miles away in Idaho. S10, Ep9
Uloma Curry-Walker. Within weeks of their wedding, a debt-ridden wife recruits a team of teenagers to help her get her hands on her husband's life insurance policy. S3, Ep9
The Last Dance. After years of suffering in silence, Francisca Quintero finally leaves her violent husband. But for him, there is no such thing as a divorce. S11, Ep5
Weight Control. Ashley's new confidence enrages estranged husband Terry, who stalks her to a secluded lot, ready to reclaim control in the deadliest way. S11, Ep7

programmes.show_name: American Detective With Lt Joe Kenda
programmes.show_description: Mr. X. Detective Ben Elkins gets called in to search for a missing farmhand. But when the man's body turns up miles down the Coweeman river, the case takes a sinister turn. S2, Ep12
Operation Howze And Bolton Fraud. Barrister Robert Rinder explores the case of a gang who terrorised the elderly and vulnerable, stealing hundreds of thousands of pounds. S2, Ep1
Room 48. In 2018, three women were held hostage in a motel room. The night ended in the death of Amber Meadows. CCTV reveals to police who pulled the trigger. S9, Ep12
Black Widow Of Pennsylvania. When Myrle's husband dies under mysterious circumstances, her daughter Rebecca suspects she's a black widow in disguise. S10, Ep12
No Escape. When Peggy returns to school to pursue her dream of becoming a doctor, she catches the eye of a fellow student. But, she has no idea of his dark and obsessive personality. S6, Ep9
Nicola Hughes And Fiona Bone. In September 2012, Dale Cregan murdered PC Nicola Hughes and PC Fiona Bone, after luring them to a callout by making a false 999 call. S5, Ep9
